good_things: See all the good things here!
define_pin_hint: The PIN is your digital signature and secures your data on this device.
your_account_hint: This will be your unique address on the Signum blockchain. Use [Regenerate] to get another random address.
your_imported_account_hint: Verify, if this address is your account. In case it does not match your account, you should go back and verify the entered seed.
enter_your_seed_hint: Please, enter your seed to import your account on this device.
your_seed_hint: It is very important that you [Download] this seed and store it in a safe place. If you lose your seed, you will lose the access to your account.
verification_hint: Enter Word {{word}} from your seed. Please, be sure you downloaded or wrote down the seed!
confirmation_text: Hereby, I confirm that I have stored the seed in a secure place. I understand that I lose access to my account, in case I lose my seed.
account_stored_success: Your account is now stored on this device
severe_error: Oh, no. Something went terribly wrong: {{reason}}
